thread.section_title: Pelican Water Systems Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pelican Water Systems | pelicanwater.com
thread.title: Brent W.
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Brent W.

author: Brent W.
title: Brent W.
text:
I've been using Pelican shower filters for 3 or 4 years now. I did a lot of shopping around before selecting a brand, and, from my research, I believe that Pelican's combination of design, function, and quality is one of the best.
The customer service that Pelican delivers is great as well. I have called a couple times over the years, and the representatives were friendly and helpful.
